Discover the brand new Beobank App.

Now see your latest transactions and news at a glance from your homepage.
Find most of the features of Beobank Online on your iPhone and access the ones you use the most with one click (checking accounts, transfers, etc.)

The App is free. The access for existing customers is done with the usual Beobank Mobile secret code or password. The registration for new customers is done with the username and security method (password and/or digipass) used on Beobank Online.

With the Beobank App :
- log in with your digital fingerprint (Touch ID) or Face ID,
- check your accounts' balance and your last transactions,
- make transfers between your accounts or to your beneficiaries,
- register and consult your beneficiaries,
- view all of your documents such as your electronic statements, and contracts signed electronically,
- consult your vehicle, home, family or life insurance policies,
- consult the valuation and details of your securities portfolios,
- consult your mortgage,
- contact your Beobank advisor,
- find the timetables and contact details of our branches,
- confirm your internet purchases easily thanks to your Beobank Mobile secret code,
- geolocate Beobank branches and Beobank ATMs,
- access the directory of useful telephone numbers.

A problem (technical or functional) ? Do not hesitate to contact us :
- by email: beobankservicecenter@beobank.be describing the problem and specifying that it is the iOS application,
- by phone: 02 626 50 50.

Thanks for using Beobank Mobile. Based on your feedback, we corrected an issue related to the use of the VoiceOver screen reader.

We regularly make enhancements to the app, don’t hesitate to let us know your feedback and we’ll take them into account in the next versions. We hope this change meets your expectations and that you enjoy using the app !
